channel.title: R Developers' Programs
channel.description: Recent content on R Developers' Programs

item.title: Course Initiated
item.description: 이번 과정을 만드는 이유 Big Data Analytic with R 과정 개발을 시작합니다.

Big Data Analytics with R Note: Due dates of exams and project will not move, however the timeline of topics and smaller assignments might be updated throughout the semester. Date Title Notes Slides Readings Day1 Welcome to Data Science Logic in R Introduction Basic R Using github Functional Programming Day2 Data Structure & Tidy Data Data wrangling with dplyr Web Scraping Shiny and Rmarkdown Parallelization Day3 Database & SQL Bigish Data SparklyR Real World Data Science

item.title: Academy for R Developers
item.description: Hugo is a static site engine written in Go. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: Cobra Viper J Walter Weatherman Cast Learn more and contribute on GitHub. Setup Some fun facts about Hugo: Built in Go Loosely inspired by Jekyll Primarily developed by spf13 on the train while commuting to and from Manhattan. Coded in Vim using spf13-vim Have questions or suggestions?

item.title: Course Schedule
item.description: Date Time Lecture Notes Readings Day1 Session 1 Introduction Session 2 Basic R Session 3 Using github Session 4 Functional Programming Day2 Session 1 Data Structure & Tidy Data Session 2 Data wrangling with dplyr Session 3 Web Scraping Session 4 Shiny and Rmarkdown Day3 Session 1 Parallelization Session 2 Database & SQL Session 3 Bigish Data Day 4 Session 1 SparklyR Session 2 Real World Data Science Topics 소
